CustomField.description: [EBH] (EPH-3985) - Main Tier Threshold (% of Target), US-0010717 - Accelerator & Decelerator target fields tooltip descriptions
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the percentage of target the customer needs to achieve in order to qualify for the main tier rebate (normally 100% but can be negotiated individually with the seller)
CustomField.label: Main Tier Threshold (% of Target)
